name: Shoot me NOT
description:
A fast paced arcade mini game where a spherical cannon shoots colorful balls, so you need to collect the ones with the same color as the cannon's indicator

How high can you go!?

As simple as it sounds ... it's fun and quite addictive :)

Hint: keep an eye on the cannon's direction ;)

Keys:

To move the spherical cannon use the mouse drag or the arrow keys

Available on Google Play Store:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....
